rulelist.rule: Vigilance
You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
If target opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.

rulelist.rule: Horsemanship

Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

Tap one or two target creatures without horsemanship.

rulelist.rule: Horsemanship
When Cao Ren, Wei Commander enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.
Take an extra turn after this one.
Cast Champion's Victory only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Return target attacking creature to its owner's hand.
Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
Draw four cards, then discard three cards at random.
When Corrupt Court Official enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
When Corrupt Eunuchs enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
When Council of Advisors enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Return one or two target creatures to their owners' hands.
{T}: Target opponent discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
Target opponent discards two cards.
Desert Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each creature.
Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
{T}: Destroy target creature of your choice, then destroy target creature of an opponent's choice. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
When Dong Zhou, the Tyrant enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to that player.
Target opponent skips all combat phases of his or her next turn.
Target opponent chooses a creature he or she controls. Other creatures he or she controls can't block this turn.
Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.
Counter target sorcery spell.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
Famine deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
Fire Ambush deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Sacrifice Fire Bowman: Fire Bowman deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
Whenever Flanking Troops attacks, you may tap target creature.
Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

{T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

Target opponent chooses a creature he or she controls. Destroy it.
When Imperial Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.
